metadata.name: AWS-Style Pricing
metadata.description: This is an AWS-style pricing component showcasing different service tiers with their features, prices, and CTAs.
metadata.author: Admin

html:
Cloud Computing Services Pricing

Developer
$0?Free tier includes limited resources
  • 750 EC2 Hours/Month
  • 5GB S3 Storage
  • Basic Support
  • 1M Lambda Requests
Start Free Tier
Business
$299/month
  • Unlimited EC2 Hours
  • 500GB S3 Storage
  • Business Support
  • 10M Lambda Requests
Start Business Plan
Enterprise
Custom?Contact sales for enterprise pricing
  • Dedicated Instances
  • TB+ Storage
  • 24/7 Premium Support
  • Custom Solutions
Contact Sales

* Prices may vary by region and usage. See full pricing details for more information.
